model

Class BorrowedThingDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.BorrowedThingDAO

  • public class BorrowedThingDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    Data access object class for Borrowed things. Used for accessing data concerning Borrowed items.

    • Constructor Summary

      • readBorrowedThingsByPerson

        public BorrowedThing[] readBorrowedThingsByPerson(int person_id)
        Method for reading Borrowed Things in the database that use a concrete Person
        Parameters:
        person_id - int referring to the Person that might be used for Borrowed Thing
        Returns:
        BorrowedThing[] Array containing all Borrowed items connected with this person in the database
